featured.text: 19 Happy Puppy is a relatively new service, we benefit from more than 20 years of experience in breeding and caring for dogs.
After a spa treatment at Happy Puppy, dogs come home 16 pampered and relaxed.
You can also bring your dog to Happy Puppy and wash it yourself.
At Happy Puppy, your dog can enjoy a half day of care and then be taken to the salon at naptime.

definition.en_def: A young dog, especially one that is not yet fully grown.
definition.example: The puppy played happily in the garden.
